metadata.title: Adult Cobra Kai Costume Mens, Officially Karate Kid Sleeveless Black Gi Uniform Halloween Outfit
features: Wrap around shirt ties at waist
Embroidered Cobra Kai patches on front and back of shirt
Pants have elastic waist, and embroidered patches on legs
description: The Fun Costumes Karate Kid Cobra Kai Costume We're fans, too, which is why we love re-creating iconic costume styles from some of our favorite flicks. The Karate Kid is one of the most memorable movies of the 80s, which is why we were proud to partner with Columbia Pictures to produce our own line of authentic and officially licensed Karate Kid costumes. When you're ready to suit up as a member of the Cobra Kai dojo we're sure you'll find this Authentic Cobra Kai Costume to be the perfect fit. Attention to Detail We designed this costume as a replica right from the original 1984 movie and it comes with a sleeveless shirt, pants, a belt, and a headband. The tunic shirt has a self-fabric waist tie, gold edging, and an embroidered Cobra Kai logo. The pants have an elastic waist and embroidered patches featured on each leg. The twill belt is 2 inches wide, and the headband is also 2 inches wide and features an embroidered patch in the center. Product Details: 100% polyester Wrap around shirt ties at waist Printed Cobra Kai patches on front and back of shirt Pants have elastic waist, patches on leg Belt is 2" wide x 100" long Headband has embroidered patch Size Chart:  XS: Chest=44"; Shirt Length=29”; Waist=27-34”; Pants Length=38 1/4” S: Chest=48"; Shirt Length=30”; Waist=29-38”; Pants Length=38 1/2” M: Chest=50"; Shirt Length=32”; Waist=32-42”; Pants Length=41 1/2” L: Chest=52"; Shirt Length=33 1/2”; Waist=36-46”; Pants Length=42” XL: Chest=58"; Shirt Length=34”; Waist=40-48”; Pants Length=43” About Us: Fun Costumes are exclusively made by us and begin with passion, teamwork, and industry expertise decades in the making. Our products are proof that with the right people even a simple idea can grow into something incredible. We started in a small garage in Minnesota, providing costumes to our local community, and now we’re creating costumes for people all around the world! - Shirt - Pants - Belt - Headband

title: Adult Karate Kid Cobra Kai Costume
